issue.title: [Rust][CI] Builds failing due to rust nightly formatting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7097](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7097). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see e.g. https://github.com/apache/arrow/runs/293573608 on master

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7097?focusedCommentId=16970222) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5795
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5795>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7097?focusedCommentId=16970425) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
`[~andygrove]` can someone look which version of rustfmt we should use? At the time I wrote `archery lint`, it was rustfmt from stable, now it seems the docker build image use nightly=2019-09-25
